preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 24 g of beryllium powder. 
 2. Weigh out 1 g of calcium powder. 
 3. Weigh out 2 g of copper powder. 
 4. Weigh out 1 g of praseodymium powder. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine all powders thoroughly using a spatula to ensure an even mixture.
